about_the_game:
Flying over the islands of the Indian Ocean, your helicopter malfunctioned, as a result of which you crashed. You miraculously survived, finding yourself alone with the local nature of the islands and the water element. You will have to plunge into the odyssey of survival and face unforeseen circumstances, find out the secret of these places and the reason for the helicopter crash. Get a new experience every time in order to ultimately survive and find out if there is a way to get out of here!

You will have to build a shelter, protect yourself from weather conditions, dive in search of sunken ships, fight hostile animals and savages, engage in plant growing, electricity, fishing and much more.

Play alone or together!

Key features:

  • Keep track of your character's status, time, compass and more using a smartwatch

-

  • Create your own unique character.

  • Explore the island you find yourself on when you wake up.

  • Stock up on resources and food to avoid starvation.

  • Build a shelter to survive the night safely.

  • Hunt. Grow. Cook. Fish.

  • Build a raft and explore neighboring islands.

  • Explore and find a way to return to your normal life.

  • Get Steam achievements

  • Become the top link in the food chain
